name: claude-skills
description: Custom Claude Code skills for productivity workflows

plugins.name: sort-later
plugins.description: Organize messy bookmarks into markdown notes (articles) and browser-importable HTML (functional sites). Works with any bookmark source — browser exports, Pocket, Raindrop, Instapaper, plain URL lists, or anything else.

plugins.name: agents-md-skill
plugins.description: Write lean, effective agent instructions — context files (AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md) and slash commands. Most auto-generated ones make agents worse (arXiv:2602.11988v1). This skill knows what to keep and what to cut.
